attributes.action: make St George's day an English bank holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: England needs to promote it's history and culture. Other countries do this daily e.g. in America school children sing the anthem daily and American independence is celebrated. Hence we petition that the patron Saint of England should be more widely recognised by the granting of a bank holiday for everyone in England.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
